un goals.2: Biologicals allow to grow more with less. The use of biologicals as complementary agricultural products improves food security, by helping to sustainably produce more food on less acreage, closing the gap between population growth and global food demand
un goals.6: Biologicals offer safer, alternative solutions to agrochemicals such as herbicides and pesticides. Using them in place or in combination with synthetic products reduces the chemical residues currently found in freshwater sources, thus improving safely managed drinking water
un goals.12: Reducing the manufacturing and application of fertilizers and pesticides, which are major contributors to greenhouse gas emissions, through the use of biologicals fosters responsible resource consumption and agricultural production
un goals.15: Alternative agricultural production methods, including the use of biological products, aim to support plant and animal biodiversity within terrestrial ecosystems, and reduce soil degradation currently seen with traditional fertilizer use

vision: “Supply best in class biologicals to the industry”

vc.strain: Evologic builds upon tested strains. We don´t go into strain screening but focus on production and formulation
vc.production: We really like bioreactors. And our team of scientists and engineers with pharma background shares that passion. From lab to manufacturing scale we think science in an industrial context. If we can´t think it big we rather try a different approach
vc.formulation: Product quality needs to be conserved through formulation. Having production and formulation in house we can integrate both unit operations into our process development. We really go to lengths to stabilize the sensitive nature of the microorganisms whatever it takes – co-formulation freeze drying, fluid bed drying or even encapsulation. However we strive for the most minimalistic formulation to reach maximum shelf life
vc.application: The application technology is crucial for market adoption. However, application technology is not our area of expertise. We collaborate with partners to implement a most versatile application technology
vc.distribution: Evologic does not address the end user directly but collaborates with distribution partners. The scalability of our manufacturing processes in combination with the robust product quality makes Evologic the perfect partner even for large scale projects
vc.field: End of the day our products shall benefit the farmers around the world. Only useful and efficient products will have a significant impact. But biologicals as such have a substantial potential to minimize the environmental footprint of farming
